name: MyScout
0:
”Alexa, ask My Scout about the Scout Oath?”
”Alexa, ask My Scout about the Scout Law?”
”Alexa, ask My Scout about trustworthy?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my scout
des:
Learn about Scout laws.

Just say 'Alexa, ask My Scout about trustworthy?' and she will answer 'TRUSTWORTHY: Tell the truth and keep promises. People can depend on you.'

Try asking about other Laws, too.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
